alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 327 PM EDT/227 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Wewahitchka, or 14 miles east of Callaway. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
